title: feat(quic): implement NEW_TOKEN frame (RFC 9000 §19.7)
body:
## RFC 9000 Section 19.7: NEW_TOKEN Frame

### Overview
Implement NEW_TOKEN frame for server-provided tokens.

### Complexity: LOW (~100 lines)
Simple token delivery mechanism.

### Key Requirements
- Frame Type: 0x07
- Token Length (varint)
- Token (opaque bytes)
- Only sent by server to client
- Client stores for future connections to same server

### Implementation
**Files:**
- `include/quic/SocketQUICFrame.h`
- `src/quic/SocketQUICFrame-token.c`

**Functions:**
```c
size_t SocketQUICFrame_encode_new_token(const uint8_t *token, size_t token_len,
                                         uint8_t *out, size_t out_len);
int SocketQUICFrame_decode_new_token(const uint8_t *data, size_t len,
                                      uint8_t *token_out, size_t *token_len);
```

### Dependencies
- #384 (Section 12 - Frame infrastructure)
- #377 (Section 16 - VarInt)
